faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PolitiTrades and congressional trading data.

source.question: Where does PolitiTrades get its data?
source.answer: All data is sourced directly from official government disclosure filings, including the U.S. House of Representatives Financial Disclosure Reports, U.S. Senate Periodic Transaction Reports, and SEC EDGAR filings.

speed.question: How quickly are new trades added?
speed.answer: We monitor official filing systems continuously and add new trades within 15 minutes of publication.

legal.question: Is it legal for politicians to trade stocks?
legal.answer: Yes, members of Congress are allowed to trade stocks, but they must disclose their trades within 45 days under the STOCK Act.

investment.question: Can I use this data to make investment decisions?
investment.answer: PolitiTrades provides information for educational and research purposes. This is not investment advice.

premium.question: What's included in the Premium plan?
premium.answer: Premium includes unlimited politician tracking, real-time push notifications, full historical data, advanced analytics, and API access.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

api.question: Do you offer an API?
api.answer: Yes, Premium subscribers get access to our REST API, which provides programmatic access to all trading data.
